Info

This widget is for basic structured information.


Source: Pitchbook (Adobe Inc)
Fix Company Name
Expand Widget
Hide Widget

Name

Adobe Inc

Description

Adobe Inc. is an American multinational computer software company. Incorporated in Delaware and headquartered in San Jose, California, it has historically focused upon the creation of multimedia and creativity software products, with a more recent foray towards digital marketing software.
